data.text: And it came to pass on a certain day,
And the Lord said to the devil, Whence comest thou?
And the Lord said to the devil,
And the devil answered and said to the Lord,
Nay, but put forth thy hand, and touch his bones and his flesh:
And the Lord said to the devil, Behold, I deliver him up to thee;
So the devil went out from the Lord,
And he took a potsherd to scrape away the discharge,
And when much time had passed, his wife said to him,
Behold, I wait yet a little while,
For, behold, thy memorial is abolished from the earth,
And thou thyself sittest down to spend the nights in the open air among the corruption of worms,
And I am a wanderer and a servant
But say some word against the Lord, and die.
But he looked on her, and said to her,
Now his three friends having heard of all the evil that was come upon him,
And when they saw him from a distance they did not know him;
And they sat down beside him seven days and seven nights,
